page.title: 13How Whittlesey has changed
page.content: In just five years the town that I live in has changed in many ways. These are just some of the changes that I have noticed. In 1980 there were more grave stones in St Marys churchyard than there are now. They have been moved to the edge to make a park. The buttercross has been repaired and they have opened a small town museum. Where I play now has changed since 1980 because it wasn't a park then, it was a road. The brick works is fairly old but by it was a field 2 or 3 years ago, now it's a massive hole with long tunnels, large boulders diggers and stack's of brick's. Between our school and the church was a field where horses used to be kept. Now it has been used to build houses on .
